_comments.server_url: Get this from RunPod dashboard -> Port 7777 HTTP Service. For local testing, use http://localhost:7777
_comments.poll_interval: Seconds between status checks. Increase for slower networks (default: 3.0)
_comments.timeout: Maximum seconds to wait for job completion. Increase for large PDFs (default: 600)
_comments.workers: Number of parallel upload workers. Set to 1 for sequential processing (default: 2)
